summary: This ENB preset aims at provided a look that seems next-gen
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Verdana][center][size=6][color=#1e84cc]Real[/color][color=#1155cc]NEXT[/color][/size][color=#1e84cc][size=6] ENB and Graphics[/size][/color][/center][color=#1e84cc][size=6] [center]Guide[/center][/size]
[/color][/font][size=2]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/size][/b][size=3]This ENB preset is meant to make Skyrim look like a current game, and provide more diversity between day, night, and storms. 
[color=#ff0000]Warnings before install[/color]
[list][*][size=3]Follow my install guide. Things may not work properly or look right if you do not[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]This Mod darkens the shadows causing the night to already be dark so any mods that increase nighttime darkness might make some areas during the nighttime to be a so dark it is unplayable. [/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Is not compatible with other ENB mods.[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]ENB is designed to work with my recommend mods. This mods help your game look a bit more realistic with my mod[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Do not install any parallax mods if you are using my recommended textures. [/size][/*]
[/list][/size][size=5][u][b]Installing my ENB preset Instructions[/b][/u]

[/size][list=1][*][size=2]Download v0.236 from http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm and put your perfered version (Wrapper or Injector) files into skyrim's main folder.[/size]
[/*]
[*][size=2]Download my mod ethier the normal or extreme preset (DO NOT USE NMM) and put my files in skyrim's main folder[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Overwrite all files [/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Download these mods from the NEXUS. ENB will look unrealistic and cartoon like if not installed.[/size][/*]
[/list][list][*][size=2]Climates Of Tamriel http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50201/?[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]SweetFX Shader Suite http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23364/?[/size][/*]
[/list][u][size=5]MOD Guide
[/size][/u]
[size=2][u]Flora [/u][/size][u][size=2](Download all in order listed and overwrite everything as needed)[/size][/u][size=2][b]
[list][*][size=2]Skyrim Flora Overhaul http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?[/size][/*]
[/list][list][*][size=2]Unique Grasses and Groundcovers http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42370/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Unique Grasses and Groundcovers Plugin http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54196/?[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Realistic Aspen Trees
[/size][/*]
[/list]Choice one of the tree opinions below[list][*][size=2]Lush Trees and Grass http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3288/?tab=7&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodvideo%2F%3Fvtype%3D0%26id%3D3288&pUp=1 (Unique Grasses and Groundcovers has better grass so their is no need to use grass textures) [color=#ff0000](Warning distance LODs look 2D if used with Flora Overhaul, so only use if you do not mind bad LODs.)[/color][/size][/*]
[/list][color=#ff0000]        [/color][color=#f4f4f4]or
[list][*][size=2]Realistic Pine Trees http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43677/? (Recommended)[/size][/*]
[/list][/color][/b][u]Lighting (Choice only one)[/u][/size][list][*][size=2]Shadows http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50855/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D50855%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D1383353&pUp=1 (Works best with my ENB)[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]       OR
[/size][list][*][size=2]Realistic Lighting Overhaul http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?[/size][/*]
[/list][u][size=2]Textures (Download all in order listed and overwrite everything as needed)
[/size][/u][list][*][size=2]SMIM http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]2K Textures http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/? (Recommend Let all other textures in this list to overwrite these textures)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Realistic Clouds http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56137/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul                                                                             Landscape http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38539/?[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Real Roads for Skyrim http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55518/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Farmhouses http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53210/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Dragonborn http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42348/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Vivid Landscapes http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49344/? [/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Mossy Floor http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30120/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Expand Object LODs http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54466/? (Only overwrite mods under textures and Skyrim Flora Overhaul)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Cinematic Fire Effects 2 HD http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2692/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]4K UHD Parallax Retextures http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49661/? (Optional: [color=#ff0000]Warning may cause major FPS drops in some areas)[/color][/size][/*]
[/list][u][size=2]Water[/size][/u][list][*][size=2]WATER http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13268/? (My personal preference with ENB)
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]New textures for WATER http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50410/? (Optional Textures if you do not like the default) (used in some of my screenshots)
[/size][/*]
[/list][b][size=2]        OR[/size][/b][list][*][size=2]Realistic Water Two [b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/? (If your just using this as a guide these are my personal preference for non-ENB use) [/b][/size][/*]
[/list][size=2][u]Tweaks[/u]
[/size][list][*][size=2]EWIs High SkyrimPrefs and inis http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51033/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D51033&pUp=1
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]USKP http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]UDGP http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23491/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]UHFP http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25127/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]UDBP http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31083/?[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]Armor and weapons (Choose only one)
[/size][list][*][size=2]aMidianBorn Book of Silence http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]SkyRealism - Shiny http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48526/?
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]aMidianBorn Book of Silence (Download only the armor and creature retextures) http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/? and WRP http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1754/? (What am using)[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
Enjoy!!![/size]
author: Darclord
